item.title: Setting up Bitbucket's Pipelines for frontend deployment on AWS S3
item.description: Bitbucket is my main git repo for all my personal (PoC) projects, portfolio and all of my contracting projects - hands down on private repo. While I’ve tried Codeship, CircleCI, Jenkins for production use, however, all of these CI server needs some little education about private and public certificates for setting up roles/permission/access before any of them can pull out your source code and push it to eg: Amazon S3 — Pipelines + AWS S3 was far bit easier.
